Aggregate Progression Conditions

Source: R/progress_aggregator.R
progress_aggregator.Rd

Aggregate Progression Conditions

Usage

progress_aggregator(progress)

Arguments

progress

A progressor function.

Value

A function of class progress_aggregator.

Examples

library(progressr)

message("progress_aggregator() ...")
#> progress_aggregator() ...

with_progress({
  progress <- progressor(steps = 4L)
  relay_progress <- progress_aggregator(progress)
  progress()
  relay_progress(slow_sum(1:3))
  relay_progress(slow_sum(1:10))
  progress()
})
#> M: Added value 1
#> M: Added value 2
#> M: Added value 3
#> M: Added value 1
#> M: Added value 2
#> M: Added value 3
#> M: Added value 4
#> M: Added value 5
#> M: Added value 6
#> M: Added value 7
#> M: Added value 8
#> M: Added value 9
#> M: Added value 10
#> NULL

message("progress_aggregator() ... done")
#> progress_aggregator() ... done
